plugins\/zwavejs\/plugin_info\/configura.Le plugin jMQTT est installé, veuillez v: The jMQTT plugin is installed, please check the configuration of the broker in the jMQTT plugin and report it, if necessary, in the MQTT Manager plugin

plugins\/zwavejs\/plugin_info\/configura.Cocher la case pour supprimer automatiqu: Check the box to automatically delete Jeedom equipment corresponding to devices excluded from the controller
plugins\/zwavejs\/plugin_info\/configura.Cocher la case pour être notifié dans le: Tick the checkbox to be notified in the Jeedom message center of dead nodes and the return to the Alive state
Check the box to be notified in the Jeedom message center of missed awakenings and return to normal

plugins\/zwavejs\/plugin_info\/configura.Veuillez relancer les dépendances pour m: Please restart the dependencies to update the library. Then restart the daemon to see the new version
plugins\/zwavejs\/plugin_info\/configura.Les clés de sécurités sont à conserver p: The security keys must be carefully kept. If you lose your keys, the devices included in secure must be paired again. The keys can be specified, if the fields are empty or invalid the plugin will generate them and you can see them afterwards
plugins\/zwavejs\/plugin_info\/configura.Si votre contrôleur a été utilisé avec l: If your controller was used with the Openzwave plugin and you included secure modules, the S0 key is
plugins\/zwavejs\/plugin_info\/configura.Clé de Sécurité S2 Authenticated Long Ra: S2 Authenticated Long Range Security Key

plugins\/zwavejs\/plugin_info\/configura.La prise en compte sera effective après: The taking into account will be effective after saving and restarting the daemon

plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/modal\/networ.Une mise à jour de firmware\/sdk est une: A firmware/sdk update is a risky operation. Make sure that the firmware is validated by the manufacturer for your controller and that the version of this one allows the update
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/modal\/networ.Toutes les routes ont plus d'un saut: All roads have more than one jump
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/modal\/networ.Nombre de [routes directes \/ avec 1 sau: Number of [direct routes / with 1 jump / 2 jumps]
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/modal\/networ.Au moins 2 routes avec un saut: At least 2 routes with a jump
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/modal\/networ.Moins de 2 routes avec un saut: Less than 2 routes with a jump
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/modal\/networ.Demander les voisins de tout le réseau: Ask neighbors of the whole network
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/modal\/networ.Demande au contrôleur les voisins de tou: Asks the controller for the neighbors of all nodes including itself. This procedure cuts off radio transmissions while it is being carried out
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/modal\/networ.Cette procédure lance un soin du réseau: This procedure launches a network heal and will be long. It is generally not useful
Stops a network heal in progress
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/modal\/networ.Envoie les noms et objets des équipement: Sends device names and objects to the Z-Wave network
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/modal\/networ.Redémarre le contrôleur sans effacer ses: Restarts the controller without erasing its network configuration settings
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/modal\/networ.Remet à zéro le contrôleur et efface ses: Resets the controller and clears its network configuration settings
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/modal\/networ.ne sera fait en cas de changement d'un r: will only be made if a setting of the
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/modal\/networ.Vous pouvez changez le mot de passe util: You can change the user password if you wish. You can use the features
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/modal\/networ.Les sauvegardes NVM ne sont pas intercom: NVM backups are not intercompatible from a Z-Wave SDK version controller lower than 6.61 to a higher version controller and vice versa

Heal the node within the network
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/modal\/node.i.Demande l'actualisation de l'ensemble de: Requests the refresh of all node values. Action on the network
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/modal\/node.i.Demande au nœud de (re)découvrir ses voi: Asks the node to (re)discover its neighbors. Action on the network
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/modal\/node.i.Envoie les noms et objet de l'équipement: Sends the names and object of the equipment to the Z-Wave network
Triggers a re-interview of the node
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/modal\/node.i.Les données du nœud sont obtenues du rés: Node data is obtained from the Z-Wave network as if it was just added
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/modal\/node.i.N'intervient pas sur le réseau mais resy: Does not intervene on the network but resynchronizes the jeedom values with the controller
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/modal\/node.i.Vérifie si le nœud est dans la liste des: Checks if the node is in the list of nodes in error
Allows you to remove a node from the network
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/modal\/node.i.Une mise à jour de firmware est une opér: A firmware update is a risky operation. Make sure that the firmware is indeed validated by the manufacturer for your module and that the version of this one allows the update

Le démon Z-Wave n'est pas démarré
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/php\/zwavejs..Le driver Z-Wave n'est pas initialisé, v: Le driver Z-Wave n'est pas initialisé, veuillez patienter. Si le message reste trop longtemps, veuillez vérifier la configuration du démon
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/php\/zwavejs..Permet de recréer les commandes en fonct: Allows you to recreate the commands according to the operating mode of the desired module. Save the mode then on the order page reload your orders
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/php\/zwavejs..Nombre de commandes actuelles en ignoran: Number of current commands ignoring the 4 technical commands of each equipment of the plugin
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/php\/zwavejs..Le nœud n'a pas encore été initié. Il se: The node has not yet been initiated. It will be updated automatically when initialization is complete. It will take a few seconds. In case of secure inclusion or module on batteries it can be longer. For a node on stack if the message persists you can try to wake it up manually
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/php\/zwavejs..Le nœud n'a pas encore de: The node does not yet have
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/php\/zwavejs..Cela peut arriver et peut avoir différen: This can happen and can have different causes:
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/php\/zwavejs..Soit le module c'est initié trop tôt et: Either the module is initiated too early and in this case, you just have to click on
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/php\/zwavejs..sur la page précédente et ensuite de cli: on the previous page and then click on
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/php\/zwavejs..Soit le module n'a pas encore de configu: Either the module does not yet have a Jeedom configuration. You can check it by clicking on the button
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/php\/zwavejs..sur la page d'équipement. Si vous ne vo: on the equipment page. If you don't see a configuration next to
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/php\/zwavejs..et créer les commandes dont vous avez b: and create the commands you need by clicking on the pencils
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/php\/zwavejs..Soit cela est normal, dans le cas d'un r: Either this is normal, in the case of a repeater or a controller for example
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/php\/zwavejs..Cette section permet de définir des règl: This section allows you to define automatic refresh rules after action. It is essential not to put anything here without a valid reason, otherwise your Z-Wave network will be penalized. This possibility is available to manage some very rare modules that have bugs
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/php\/zwavejs..Si c'est nécessaire, cette section sera: If necessary, this section will surely be pre-filled by the Jeedom configuration. The total duration (number x wait) cannot exceed 100s
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/php\/zwavejs..Commande action déclenchant le cycle de: Action command triggering the refresh cycle (in cc-endpoint-property-value format (optional))
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/php\/zwavejs..Commande info devant être rafraîchie (au: Info command to be refreshed (in cc-endpoint-property format)
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/php\/zwavejs..Temps d'attente entre chaque demande (en: Waiting time between each request (in s)

plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/js\/zwavejs.j.Voulez-vous appliquer le jeu de configur: Do you want to apply the configuration set recommended by the Jeedom team
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/js\/zwavejs.j.Configuration appliquée. Cependant ce mo: Configuration applied. However, this module requires a wake-up to be effective
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/js\/zwavejs.j.Inclusion par défaut (utilisera le meill: Include by default (will use the best mode for the module)
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/js\/zwavejs.j.Vous ne pouvez pas activer une classe de: You cannot enable an unsupported security class. In most cases, do not modify anything. If you un-include S2, the module will include itself as insecure
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/js\/zwavejs.j.Veuillez vérifier la clé de sécurité et: Please check the security key and complete it. The inclusion will take a few seconds to complete after this step. A bad key means an insecure inclusion
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/js\/zwavejs.j.Le driver Z-Wave n\\'est pas initialisé,: The Z-Wave driver is not initialized, please wait. If the message stays too long, please check the daemon configuration
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/js\/zwavejs.j.Un périphérique vient d\\'être inclu\/ex: A device has just been included/excluded. Please refresh the page
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/js\/zwavejs.j.Sans recréer les commandes mais en créan: Without recreating the commands but creating the missing ones
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/js\/zwavejs.j.En supprimant les commandes qui ne sont: By deleting commands that are not in the configuration
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/js\/zwavejs.j.Attention : \"En recréant les commandes\: Warning: "By recreating the commands" will delete the existing commands
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/js\/zwavejs.j.Etes-vous sûr de vouloir récréer toutes: Are you sure you want to recreate all commands? This will delete existing commands

plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/js\/nodeValue.Comment voulez-vous modifier la valeur: How do you change the value
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/js\/nodeValue.Attention : Le polling alourdissant le r: Caution: Polling weighs down the network, it should only be used when absolutely necessary
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/js\/nodeValue.Etes-vous sûr de vouloir créer cette com: Are you sure you want to create this info command
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/js\/nodeValue.Si elle existe déjà elle ne sera pas cré: If it already exists it will not be created
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/js\/nodeValue.Etes-vous sûr de vouloir créer la ou les: Are you sure you want to create the command(s)
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/js\/nodeValue.Les commandes existantes ne seront pas c: Existing commands will not be created
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/js\/nodeValue.Le nœud est en statut \"présumé mort\",: The node is in "presumed dead" status, so there are no dynamic values to display

plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/js\/network.j.Etes-vous sûr ? Cette opération est risq: Are you sure ? This operation is risky
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/js\/network.j.Etes-vous certain ? Votre contrôleur ser: Are you sure? Your controller will be reset to factory default
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/js\/network.j.Etes-vous sûr ? Cette opération n'est pa: Are you sure ? This operation does not take very long, but the network will be down during the NVM backup
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/js\/network.j.Etes-vous certain de vouloir réaliser un: Are you sure you want to perform an NVM backup now?
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/js\/network.j.Demande des voisins en cours: Request from intermediate nodes in progress
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/js\/network.j.Etes-vous sûr de vouloir restaurer cette: Are you sure you want to restore this backup to the controller? This action will erase your controller completely
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/js\/network.j.Etes-vous certain de vouloir réaliser un: Are you sure you want to perform an NVM restore now?
plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/js\/network.j.Etes-vous sûr de vouloir supprimer cette: Are you sure you want to delete this NVM backup?

plugins\/zwavejs\/desktop\/js\/waiting.j.Cela supprimera l\\'élément de la liste: This will remove the item from the Jeedom waitlist but the setting will still be sent. Useful for parameters that do not return the same value as the one sent (calibration for example)
